posts.title: Git Bash常用指令
posts.text: Git Bash常用指令1$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "邮箱地址" 按下回车 12Generating public/private rsa key pair.Enter file in which to save the key (/c/Users/dizheyoulan/.ssh/id_rsa): 按下回车 12Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase):键入密码 按下回车 1再次键入密码 按下回车 12345Your identification has been saved in /c/Users/gs/.ssh/id_rsa.Your public key has been saved in /c/Users/gs/.ssh/id_rsa.pub.The key fingerprint is:fingerprnt值 你的邮箱The key's randomart image is: 查看id_rsa.pub1cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub 私人密钥和GitHub进行认证1ssh -T git@github.com 按下回车后出现 123The authenticity of host 'github.com (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)' can't be established.RSA key fingerprint is SHA256:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? 输入yes后回车 12Warning: Permanently added 'github.com,xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.Enter passphrase for key '/c/Users/gs/.ssh/id_rsa': 输入密码后回车 1Hi userid! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access. 出现以上字符表示成功 clone仓库1git clone [URL] 其余常用指令1234567891011121314151617181920#在当前目录新建一个名称为name的库git init name#添加指定目录所有文件到暂存区git add [name]#添加当前目录所有文件到暂存区git add .#提交所有暂存区的文件到本地仓库git commit -m'注释'# 查看仓库状态git status #查看file文件的修改内容git diff <file># 把当前master分支推送到远程库(第一次要用-u)git push –u origin master
